roleset.name: surprise
roleset.note: STARTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'startle' based on sentences in brown. Verbnet entry (from startle.01-v predicate notes)
STARTLING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from startling.01-j)

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: The disclosure by Charles Bellows, chief defense counsel, startled observers and was viewed as the prelude to a quarrel between the six attorneys representing the eight former policemen now on trial.
example.arg: the disclosure by Charles Bellows, chief defense counsel

example.name: passive
example.text: She could easily understand why the two men had been startled *trace* to find a strange girl in the back seat of their car.
example.arg: *trace* to find a strange girl in the back seat of their car

example.name: with odd end result
example.text: Maybe one could be startled into forgetfulness.
